Best in class research

Research & Tools

Finding your way in the complex markets can be as easy or difficult as your research. Here, at Religare, we’ve got your back with powerful insights, intelligent processes and a sound and sensible team.

Award winning research

Service, insight and value come under one roof with our in-depth research. Conducted regularly by real people on ground, these findings have proven their expertise over time, and have been validated by several industry honours.

Dig out more

Experienced Team

The ups and downs of the stock market are often best left to those who have been there, done that. That is why our experienced team is here to guide you on your trading journey. Together, you will be able to navigate the seas with ease.

Meet our Experts

Research-based Recommendations

Our research generates real-time insights and reports to set clear investment destinations. Tailored to each person’s individual goals, these reports are an ideal balance of company credentials and market disruption.

View our Reports

Advanced tools

Efficient trading runs on tools that are effective and precise. Our advanced and state-of-the-art tools provide trading terminals on the web, and revolutionary mobile platforms that let you trade on the go.

Explore the Tools

Glimpse of our Reports

Emails between EPA chief Scott Pruitt, energy firms renew concerns

Thousands of newly released emails showing close contact between Scott Pruitt, the new chief of the Environmental Protection Agency, and oil and natural-gas companies are casting clouds over Pruitt’s newly minted leadership of the agency tasked with protecting the nation’s air and water.

The emails, which cover a period when Pruitt was attorney general of Oklahoma.

March 8, 17 4:30 AM

Attention Investor

Prevent unauthorized transactions in your account - Update your mobile numbers/email IDs with your stock brokers. Receive information of your transactions directly from Exchange on your mobile/email at the end of the day - Issued in the interest of Investors.

Prevent Unauthorized Transactions in your demat account Update your Mobile Number with your Depository Participant. Receive alerts on your Registered Mobile for all debit and other important transactions in your demat account directly from Depository (NSDL/CDSL) on the same day issued in the interest of investors.

No need to issue cheques by investors while subscribing to IPO. Just write the bank account number and sign in the application form to authorise your bank to make payment in case of allotment. No worries for refund as the money remains in investors account.

KYC is one time exercise while dealing in securities markets - once KYC is done through a SEBI registered intermediary (broker, DP, Mutual Fund etc.), you need not undergo the same process again when you approach another intermediary. ye text Attention Investor ke accordion mein daal de... footer mein
